title: ALL THE CHAMPIONS VS THE BOARDS
body:
{{champion:154}} Woah man, how much does BluFire love me like wtf?
{{champion:80}} Ikr, Rav has a deep hatred for me... It hurts, man. I'm just doing to job!
{{champion:11}} Noone loves me...
{{champion:32}} Looks whos talking mr q q q aa penta! I'm the one noone loves!
{{champion:105}} You kidding me? I am the master of my troll pole, I'M the one noone likes..
{{champion:8}} Pfft. Your petty banter hurts me. Ima drink a blood smoothie.
{{champion:27}} Smoothie? WOW im here man!
{{champion:53}} Bli-tz cr-ank need drink!
{{champion:27}} Hey there, your a robot... you cant have a drink!
{{champion:119}} Hey man, gimme one. Im up for it! After all, I AM THE BEST!
{{champion:122}} Shut up bro, noone cares.
{{champion:154}} WHERE THE HELL'D YOU COME FROM?
{{champion:104}} Some old shanty-town... now, wheres TWISTED FATE?
{{champion:4}} Shut up ya scrublord. Wanna play some cards?
{{champion:104}} Ill wrek you any day mate! I have a new splash! Gimme a cigar, oh wait thats not allowed..
{{champion:79}} Ay singed, mate id murder one of those drinks right now!
{{champion:1}} EEE! Drinks are inapropriate! ima put my fire bear on your inapropirate losers!
{{champion:104}} but i got my cigar removed! im in the teen rating band now!
{{champion:63}} Someone say fire?
{{champion:267}} Dw guys, im here its ok.
{{champion:80}} Speaking of drinks, ive always wanted to be a baker.
{{champion:254}} And ive always wanted to punch stuff!
{{champion:238}} But you already punch stuff...
{{champion:126}} Punching stuff is for scrublords, you need a real weapon!
{{champion:24}} Oh reeeealy?
{{champion:126}} uh oh.
{{champion:34}} Whats all the comotion?
{{champion:154}} I literally have no idea.
{{summoner:4}} The f****k am i doing here?
{{champion:268}} I got nothing.
{{champion:90}} Straight.
{{champion:101}} unlike me! MWA HA HA THE POWER!
{{champion:134}} You wanna talk about POWER?
{{champion:39}} Oh shut up syndra.
{{champion:43}} Aww yeah ionian chicks ftw!
{{champion:59}} Nah DEMACIA IS THE BEST!
{{champion:86}} good work father!
{{champion:99}} Incest is bad.
{{champion:50}} Decaica is for scrublords.
{{champion:55}} preach it my lovely!
{{champion:50}} oh thank yo-
{{champion:55}} I was talking to garen :P
{{champion:154}} Ok, ok. What the hell is happening here?
{{champion:34}} I have no idea..
{{champion:122}} guys just shut up!
{{champion:60}} Okayy ssssss.
{{champion:69}} HEY! doing the sssss thing is my gimmick!
{{champion:28}} If only people liked your gimmick, unlike your new update :3
{{champion:69}} SHUT UP!
{{champion:122}} HEy! thats my gimmick!
{{champion:32}} I wish i had a gimmick...
{{champion:133}} and mine is HeartVine.
{{champion:57}} Wait, whos that?
{{champion:34}} I have no idea.
{{champion:36}} MUNDO GOES THIS WAY!
{{champion:112}} I think taht my experimental juice went sliiiightly wrong.
{{champion:27}} JUUUICE?
{{champion:53}} jui-ce?
{{champion:79}} Ahh, juice!
{{champion:20}} Yum! orange for me please!
{{champion:1}} Oh hey there... ;)
{{champion:20}} O-oh h-h-hey there!
{{champion:51}} Ah, young love...
{{champion:81}} Yeah, its really nice isnt it..
{{champion:44}} Yess... its truly outreageous..... :*
{{champion:90}} Thats it. im outta here. ima open a void portal.
{{champion:121}} Yes... change is...
{{champion:96}} Gooooooooood.
{{champion:31}} Oh heya guys, we having a tea party here or what?
{{champion:27}} tea?
{{champion:154}} Oh god make it stop!
{{champion:53}} Ju-ice!
{{champion:61}} JUICE! I MUST HAVE IT!
{{champion:36}} my thoughts exaclty.
{{champion:154}} You know what my thoughts are? we should stop.


{{champion:68}} x{{champion:18}}  I agree.

replies.body:
I will have my signature of sexy men everytime i post


 {{champion:79}}  {{champion:79}}  {{champion:79}}  {{champion:79}}  {{champion:79}}  {{champion:79}}  {{champion:79}}  {{champion:79}}
The hell did I just read...
